item.title: The Anatomy of an Office 365 Business Email Compromise
item.description: Coming soon a mutlti-part series on a compilation of things to look for, current hurdles and tricks in the information gathering and securing of an Office 365 account compromise.

item.title: Finally, a blog.
item.description: Every time I’ve attempted to blog in the past it’s only ended in two or three posts, and then me getting frustrated with managing wordpress and it’s awful ecosystem instead of getting my thoughts out. Hopefully this ends up in better results. Using Hugo with the PaperMod theme, it appears to offer a pretty clean look and very low impact. hugo basics Spin up temporary server to preview site as built:
